Class MapillaryZoomAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.openstreetmap.josm.actions.JosmAction
        • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.actions.MapillaryZoomAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MapillaryZoomAction
extends org.openstreetmap.josm.actions.JosmAction
implements MapillaryDataListener
    Zooms to the currently selected image.
